mdufa 0.1.2
  • Reference

    Filter Metrics

    filter_metrics.Rd

    Filter a MDUFA metrics table to one metric type, such as all metrics that are a percent.

    filter_metrics(data, metric_type)

    Arguments

    data

    A MDUFA performance table, such as mdufa::quarterly_performance.

    metric_type

    The metric type to filter the table to. Valid options include "integer", "percent", "double", and "text".

    Value

    A filtered performance table, with the value column in the proper format.

    Examples

    mdufa::mdufa4 %>%
  filter_metrics(metric_type = "percent")
